Text:
I did NOT Download, due to the fact I already have all these Episodes myself. Thank you for contributing The Simpsons, but I just wanted to let you know that Season 24 is still on-going. Episode 18 is this Sunday.

Thank you
@rr-ne Thanks I appreciated the comment. I know it is ongoing. I will be updating the torrent when the season ends.
The treehouse of horror episode 23 is not on season 24 as it is listed on this torrent. Its on season 23.
